tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamSchedule (
    team_id INT,
    schedule_id INT,
    training_session_date DATE,
    training_session_time TIME,
    travel_arrangement VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_arrangements (
  travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR,
  departure_date DATE,
  departure_location VARCHAR,
  arrival_date DATE,
  arrival_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
 schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 session_time TIME NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT fk_team_schedule FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_session (
 session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT NOT NULL,
 coach_id INT NOT NULL,
 location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 session_date DATE NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT fk_team_training FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_arrangement (
 arrangement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_id INT NOT NULL,
 departure_date DATE NOT NULL,
 arrival_date DATE NOT NULL,
 destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT fk_team_travel FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE training_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE NOT NULL,
    session_time TIME NOT NULL,
    session_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    session_trainer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE travel_details (
    travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    travel_date DATE NOT NULL,
    travel_destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    travel_mode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    travel_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT REFERENCES training_sessions(session_id),
    member_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
    travel_id INT REFERENCES travel_details(travel_id),
    schedule_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
